entries.title: Bachelor of Computer Application - Computer Science

entries.title: QuickCarHire (Car Rental App)
bulletPoints: Developed full-stack web app with predictive pricing and recommendation system using Flask and Azure.
Implemented CI/CD with GitHub Actions and cloud deployment via Azure App Service and Azure SQL DB.

entries.title: JobStation (Job Board App)
bulletPoints: Created web platform for jobseekers and employers, including fraud detection and live face verification.
Used PHP, Python, OpenCV, Google Cloud Console, and SQL.
